content.title: Intro
content.content:
1992
Preceded by
1992
1993
Year
1994
Followed by
1994

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1993.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - The Danish Tolkien Society, Imladris is founded.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 27 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
29 - Hobitit is aired on YLE.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 28 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
30 - Mythcon 24 begins.
31 - Roland Adlerberth dies.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 30 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
17-19 - Oxonmoot 1993.
23 - Morgoth's Ring is published in the UK.
? - Mallorn 30 is published.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 31 is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
15 - Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
27 - Magyar Tolkien Tarsasag, the Hungarian Tolkien Society, is founded.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 32 is published.

content.title: December
content.content: 14 - Morgoth's Ring is published in the US.

? - Beyond Bree J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1994 released.
? - The 1994 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar released.
? - Scholarship and Fantasy: Proceeding of the Tolkien Phenomenon, Turku, May 1992 is published.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien: A Descriptive Bibliography is published.
Years
1990 1991 1992 1993 1994 1995 1996
